answer_1: You can subscribe through our website, by calling or writing on WhatsApp/Instagram.
answer_2: We accept payment in cash and bank cards.
answer_3: Yes, you can cancel or reschedule an appointment up to 24 hours before the scheduled time.
answer_4: Yes, some procedures have medical contraindications.
answer_5: The time of the procedure depends on the selected service.

cancellation.question: Can I cancel or reschedule an appointment?

certificates.answer: Yes, all our masters have international certificates and regularly undergo advanced training courses.

contraindications.answer: Yes, each procedure has its own contraindications.

materials.answer: We use only certified premium materials from the world's leading brands.
